title: Measuring ROI in Corporate Learning & Development (L&D): Minimalist Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in operating basic corporate training programs or foundational knowledge in mathematics/statistics
context.additional_context: A course designed to equip professionals with ROI measurement methods immediately applicable to work environments, including data analysis practice using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more evaluation metrics for L&D programs aligned with organizational strategic goals
Learners can develop one or more workflow-integrated instructional design plans applying minimalist learning principles
Learners can create and interpret L&D ROI statements based on real-case data through project-based assessments
Learners can explain methods to visualize learning effectiveness measurement data using digital tools

resources: Learning Data Analysis Software (e.g., Excel, Google Data Studio)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
